## Use themes to change global "look"

Check out [Pimp my RMD](https://holtzy.github.io/Pimp-my-rmd/), by Yan Holtz

Change theme in YAML header:
```
title: "your title"
output:
    html_document:
        theme: united
        highlight: tango
```

[Preview themes here](https://bootswatch.com/)
